name: Flowing Lights
description:
Game description
Flowing Lights is a mini-boss fights single stick shooter. Solve fine-tuned handcrafted combats that will test your reflexes and your tactical thinking. Challenge yourself in a fair, easy to learn/difficult to master shoot’em up.
Only intense, bite-size fights with unlimited retries: no frustration from restarting far away, no need to memorize a whole level, just improve your skills at each try!
A new dodging and controlling experience! Take advantage of physics while sliding between bullets; anticipate gravity curved trajectories, not only straight lines!
Handcrafted fights and level design, each combat situation is fresh and different from the previous one
Each fight has 3 increasingly difficult Stars to unlock, providing additional skill-based challenges to the best players
Product information
This is a single player game, it supports most controllers (analog and digital) and keyboard+mouse.
